step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead! Ensure you feel that gentle resistance to help with lymph flow.
Excellent! Keep your palm and fingers wide open in this step.
Well done making a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. This is key for pumping action.
Perfect! Opening your hand while exhaling and relaxing helps to move the fluid. Keep visualizing the fluid moving.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm overhead, open your hand wide, and then make a fist while breathing in. This helps to move fluid effectively.
